articles.description: U.S. consumer spending increased by the most in seven months in January as the government doled out more pandemic relief money to low-income households and new COVID-19 infections dropped, positioning the economy for faster growth in the first quarter.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. consumer spending increased by the most in seven months in January as the government doled out more pandemic relief money to low-income households and new COVID-19 infecti… [+5628 chars]

articles.title: Victoria’s Secret to close up to 50 stores; Bath & Body Works shifting from malls? - syracuse.com
articles.description: L Brands also plans to spin off the lingerie retailer into a separate company.
articles.content:
Victorias Secret will close up to 50 stores this year, parent company L Brands announced Wednesday.
The lingerie retailer will permanently shutter 30 to 50 stores in the U.S. and Canada in 2021, fol… [+1664 chars]
